content: **knitted pumpkin with english rib in drops snow theme halloween ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ee-707 yarn group e or c + c ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** pumpkin in copper measures approx 13 cm vertically pumpkin in mauve and curry measures approx 10 cm vertically **materials** drops snow from garnstudio belongs to yarn group e 50 g colour 86 copper 50 g colour 83 mauve 50 g colour 85 curry 50 g colour 23 taupe **knitting gauge** 13 stitches in width and 17 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops needles size 6 mm needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to a larger needle size if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to a smaller needle size accessories some cotton wool for filling
